com.superduckinvaders.game.entity

Class Mob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Entity
      • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Character
        • com.superduckinvaders.game.entity.Mob

  • public class Mob
extends Character
    Represents an enemy in the game

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AI ai
      AI class for the mob
      private boolean boss
      Boolean indicating whether or not the mob is a boss.
      private double MOB_FIRERATE
      Double indicating the chance a mob has to fire a projectile.

      Boolean indicating whether or not the mob is a ranged mob.
      private int speed
      Speed of the mob in pixels per second
      private double targetX
      Doubles indicating the position x,y of the ranged mob target.
      private double targetY
      Doubles indicating the position x,y of the ranged mob target.
      private TextureSet textureSet
      The texture set to use for this Mob.
      private int walkSpeed

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mob

        public Mob(Round parent,
           double x,
           double y,
           int health,
           TextureSet textureSet,
           int speed,
           AI ai,
           boolean ranged,
           boolean boss)
        Constructor for a Mob character.
        Parameters:
        parent - The round the mob is created in.
        x - Mobs position in x
        y - Mobs position in y
        health - The mobs health
        textureSet - The textureSet of the mob.
        speed - The speed of the mob.
        ai - Which AI to spawn the mob with.
        ranged - Is the mob ranged or not.
        boss - Is the mob a boss or not.
